participant_1.background:
I was drafted last years by the minnesota wolves.
I went to the university of north carolina.
I am an athlete.
I play basketball.
I get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.

participant_2.background:
I am a recovering alcoholic.
I once lived in a storage locker for two months.
I make pottery.
I like to refurbish classic cars.

content.text: Hey, what do you do for fun?
I like to make pottery and refurbish classic cars.
That's cool. I've always wanted to try pottery.
It's really fun! It's a great way to relax and be creative.
Yeah, I can see that. I like to play basketball.
Oh, that's cool. Do you play professionally?
I was drafted last year by the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Wow, that's amazing! How did that happen?

I played basketball all through high school and college. I was really good, and I got a scholarship to play at the University of North Carolina. After college, I went to the NBA draft and was picked by the Timberwolves.
That's incredible! I'm so impressed.
Thanks! It's been a lot of hard work, but it's been worth it.
I'm sure it has. I can't imagine how much fun it must be to play basketball professionally.
It's a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of work. I have to practice for hours every day, and I have to travel a lot.
I can imagine. But it sounds like you love it.
I do. It's my dream job.
Well, I'm sure you're going to be successful. You seem really talented.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
So, what's your favorite thing about being a professional basketball player?
My favorite thing is being able to play the game I love for a living. I also love the travel, and I love getting to meet new people.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure you're very lucky.
I am. I'm really grateful for this opportunity.
Well, I'm sure you're going to continue to be successful. You seem like a great person.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
